Action="showActDlg('导入','/Page/P01013/Import',400,300)" ActionValue="64" /> </Controls> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Class="datagrid-btn-separator"> <Controls /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Class="toolbutton"> <Controls> <Button ID="btn-export" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-export',plain:true" Title="导出" Action="showActDlg('导出','/Page/P01013/Export',400,300)" ActionValue="128" /> </Controls> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Class="datagrid-btn-separator"> <Controls /> </StackPanel> </Controls> </ToolBar> </Controls> </StackPanel> <StackPanel ID="contian" Class="content-padding" Options="region:'center',title:'教育经历'"> <Controls> <GridView ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="fitColumns:true,fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate" Key="EduID"> <Columns> <Column Title="员工" FieldName="Name" /> <Column Title="教育程度" FieldName="EduDegree" /> <Column Title="学校名称" FieldName="EduName" /> <Column Title="专业名称" FieldName="Major" /> <Column Title="起始日期" FieldName="StartDate" HAlignment="Center" /> <Column Title="结束日期" FieldName="EndDate" HAlignment="Center" /> <Column Title="证书" FieldName="Certificate" /> <Column Title="学历性质" FieldName="EduType" /> </Columns> </GridView> </Controls> </StackPanel> </Controls> </Form> </FormViewActionCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/xml"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行删除].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="IsError" Path="Results[执行删除].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行删除].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>
